SynthFlow Programming Language - Windows Distribution
=====================================================

Thank you for downloading SynthFlow!

This package contains:
- synthflow.exe - The SynthFlow lexer executable
- synthflow.bat - Batch wrapper for better user experience
- examples/ - Sample SynthFlow programs
- docs/ - Documentation files
- README.md - Project overview
- LICENSE - License information

Installation
------------
1. Run install.bat as Administrator to install SynthFlow system-wide
2. Or manually copy the files to your preferred location

Usage
-----
After installation, you can use SynthFlow from any command prompt:

1. To analyze a file: synthflow myfile.synth
2. To use the interactive mode: synthflow.bat (double-click)

The program will tokenize SynthFlow source code and display the lexical tokens.

Uninstallation
--------------
1. Run uninstall.bat as Administrator to remove SynthFlow
2. Or manually delete the installation directory

For more information, please refer to the documentation in the docs/ directory.
